description:
Akko is an ordinary girl who attends a renowned witch academy. She dreams of becoming a cool witch like her childhood idol, http://anidb.net/ch53389 [Shiny Chariot].
Even if she gets sleepy during class, she is trying really hard every single day of her new life at Luna Nova Academy to gain the skills required to make her dream come true!
name: Atsuko Kagari
